product_name: Fulcrum Colorado's Fourteeners: From Hikes to Climbs - 3rd Edition
long_description: The revised edition of. Author: Gerry Roach. Softcover; 376 pages; color photographs and maps. Fulcrum Publishing; copyright 2011. Beside often-climbed standard routes, the guide describes many alternative and technical routes. Beautiful full-color photographs feature route overlays, and they are cross-referenced to the route descriptions. Mountains are organized by range: the Front Range, Tenmile-Mosquito Range, Sawatch Range, Sangre de Cristo Range, Elk Range and San Juan Range. Experienced author offers specialized ratings based on effort and difficulty.
short_description: The revised edition of Colorado's Fourteeners: From Hikes to Climbs brings you experienced advice and time-tested routes.
